name: bot-cargo-quality
title: Bot Cargo Quality
author: NeuralCoder3
description:
Improves bot cargo capacity with quality.
The amount is adjustable in the startup settings (default is quality-level halved).

The cargo capacity of default vanilla bots is:
[quality=normal] 1 (normal)
[quality=uncommon] 2 (uncommon)
[quality=rare] 2 (rare)
[quality=epic] 3 (epic)
[quality=legendary] 4 (legendary)
